dependencies.description:
Bottle is a fast, simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for
Python.
dependencies.name: py-bottle

dependencies.description:
Simple library for color and formatting to terminal Very simple Python
library for color and formatting in terminal. Collection of color codes
and names for 256 color terminal setups. The following is a list of 256
colors for Xterm, containing an example of the displayed color, Xterm
Name, Xterm Number and HEX.
dependencies.name: py-colored

dependencies.description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.
dependencies.name: py-django

dependencies.description:
The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programming
toolkit that assists in the recontruction, manipulation, analysis and
visualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or any
other tree-like data structure are also supported).
dependencies.name: py-ete3

dependencies.description:
A library and collection of scripts to work with Illumina paired-end
data (for CASAVA 1.8+).
dependencies.name: py-illumina-utils

Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description:
pyani is a Python3 module that provides support for calculating average
nucleotide identity (ANI) and related measures for whole genome
comparisons, and rendering relevant graphical summary output. Where
available, it takes advantage of multicore systems, and can integrate
with SGE/OGE-type job schedulers for the sequence comparisons.
dependencies.name: py-pyani

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description:
rich-argparse improves the look and readability of argparse's help while
requiring minimal changes to the code.
dependencies.name: py-rich-argparse

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

description:
Anvi’o is a comprehensive platform that brings together many aspects of
today’s cutting-edge computational strategies of data-enabled
microbiology, including genomics, metagenomics, metatranscriptomics,
pangenomics, metapangenomics, phylogenomics, and microbial population
genetics in an integrated and easy-to-use fashion through extensive
interactive visualization capabilities.
name: py-anvio
